def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    max_sum = float('-inf')
    current_sum = 1
    for i in range(n):
        current_sum = max(arr[i], current_sum + arr[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    max_sum = float('-inf')
    current_sum = -1
    for i in range(n):
        current_sum = max(arr[i], current_sum + arr[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    max_sum = float('')
    current_sum = 0
    for i in range(n):
        current_sum = max(arr[i], current_sum + arr[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    max_sum = float('-inf')
    current_sum = 0
    for i in range(n):
        current_sum = max(arr[i], current_sum - arr[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    max_sum = float('-inf')
    current_sum = 0
    for i in range(n):
        current_sum = max(arr[i], current_sum * arr[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum
